throughout her life she has faced an

situations she didn't know what she was
supposed to do with her life she
searched for her life's purpose and
while she was trying to figure out all

so she had a lot of different jobs so
Marie talks about financial well-being

how to find your calling how to land
your dream job and how to do what you
enjoyed doing and make money off of

as the author says I write as I speak
there's a lot of slang a little bit of
swear words and in general it's written
in this casual modern style with modern

the link to her channel down below in

the things that are written in this book

she's being honest and very
straightforward she's not trying to

that everyone is satisfied with what
she's
she's just giving the fats and being

and I love these words while not every

match for your situation please don't
use easy for you to say you're so lucky

life
work life whatever lots of cool

all
a lot of the things she talks about in
this book makes sense in terms of

we make up excuses why we can't learn a
language excuses are dream killers if we
allow them our excuses will keep us
locked in a prison of our own making
as the adage goes if you argue for your

but nothing is more of a deterrent to

you'll never experience the depth of

for instance when you tell yourself and

it's about making the time or that you

it's a fear that one simple fact might

is a lie this can be very much related

tell you one thing
nobody's perfect there is no such thing
as perfectionist nobody knows anything
perfectly everybody makes mistakes
that's why we're here on this planet
earth to make mistakes to learn and to
discover things and then I want you to
remember this the people who criticize
and judge and no matter what you do they
always find something that they don't
like about you or about your work those
people are deeply insecure and wounded
and this is their way to make themselves
feel better by bringing down others this
is such a huge and deep topic you
shouldn't be offended you should try to

for learning and improving and they
waste theirs on judging and criticizing
and you know what even when you like

human nature and that's okay you're not
doing whatever this that you're doing to
please everyone it's impossible do
whatever you feel like doing and
whatever makes you happy and please
yourself take this from someone who puts
herself out there for everybody to judge
